content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Furnace at position (unknown)
Consists of the following entities:
- Furnace (position unknown)

### Coal extraction point at position (unknown)
Consists of the following entities:
- Coal (position unknown)

### Iron plate factory at position (unknown)
Consists of the following entities:
- Furnace (position unknown)
- Assembling machine (position unknown)

### Error Tips

### Errors when crafting due to insufficient ingredients
- Ensure you have enough required ingredients in your inventory before attempting to craft an item. For example, crafting an iron-gear-wheel requires 1 iron-plate, which must be available.

### Errors when extracting from entities
- Make sure you are extracting from an entity that has the required items available. If the entity's inventory is empty, extraction will fail.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity on a tile before attempting to place it. Check for any existing entities occupying the intended tile.
